item.title: vermarkung
item.description: pcb size The size of the modules is described in U (Rack Unit) and HP (Horizontal Pitch). U is the height of the module. One U is 1.75" = 44.45mm. The modules are 3U, the total height would be 3*44.45mm=133.4mm. This would be too large when rails with lips are used. Therefore the height of the modules is 128.5mm. The HP is or 1/5" (5.08 mm). The real sizes are slightly smaller because of the tolerance of the PCB production process.
